Based on the user's preference cues, I would recommend "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" by Mark Twain.

This classic novel tells the story of a young boy named Tom who lives with his Aunt Polly and her two children, Mary and Ben.

As Tom grows older and learns more about life, he becomes increasingly disillusioned with the way things are in his town.

Despite this, Tom remains determined to do what is right and just, even if it means putting himself in danger.

Throughout the course of the novel, Tom encounters a number of challenges and obstacles that stand in his way, including:
